name: Scholar's Cap
data: It decreases the users strength a tiny bit.
It decreases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It decreases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a good amount.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'offensive control'.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'upper hand'.
Cap of the Scholar seems to modify the wearer's skills.
